scripts.dev: concurrently "REACT_APP_USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage dev` REACT_APP_REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage dev` REACT_APP_GATEWAY_URL=http://localhost:4000/dev/graphql REACT_APP_USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage dev` react-scripts start" "AWS_PROFILE=personal sls offline"
scripts.sls:dev: concurrently "react-scripts start" "USER_POOL=`sls output get --name userPool --stage dev` REGION=`sls output get --name region --stage dev` GATEWAY_URL=`sls output get --name gatewayUrl --stage dev` USER_POOL_CLIENT=`sls output get --name userPoolClient --stage dev`" "AWS_PROFILE=personal sls offline"
